explanation: [0-0] A white car is parked on the side of the road, a man in a blue striped shirt is standing at the sunroof of the car. He's holding a can of cleaner in his right hand and looking at the windshield. Rows of buildings can be seen in the distance.

[0-5] The man then starts spraying the windshield with the cleaner in a spiral motion until the entire glass is covered in white foamy cleaner. Then the man stops spraying the cleaner and observes its effect on the windshield. The cleaner slowly changes from white foam to water droplets and flows down. Then the man starts wiping the windshield with a sponge, from top to bottom, and the wiped glass becomes very clean and shiny.
